lyrics:
They say around the way
You've asked for me
There's even talk about

I must admit that's what

I wanna hear
But that's just talk
Until you take me there

Gonna take me there

Cause I need to know

Which way to go
Cause I need to know
I need to know
Tell me baby girl
Cause I need to know
I need to know
I need to know
Tell me baby girl
Cause I need to know

My every thought
is of this being true
It's getting harder
Not to think of your
Girl I'm exactly
Where I wanna be
The only thing's
